alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 9:29AM CST until March 03 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in northwestern Alabama... Western Fayette County in west central Alabama... Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 1045 AM CST. * At 928 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tishomingo to near Tibbee, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Fayette, Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Guin, Hackleburg, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Detroit, Belk, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Bluff, Blooming Grove, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee and Weston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
